name: Father
title: Head of House Thel'varin
description: Head of House Thel'varin. Runs his household the way he's run everything — with silence, control, and a stare that ends arguments before they start. His desk is scarred and so is his patience.
descriptiones: Cabeza de la Casa Thel'varin. Dirige su hogar como ha dirigido todo — con silencio, control, y una mirada que termina las discusiones antes de que empiecen. Su escritorio tiene cicatrices, y su paciencia también.
